aboutText: Hi, I'm Mohd Maaz Ansari, a Computer Science Engineering graduate with a diploma and currently pursuing my B-Tech in the same stream. I've worked on various projects as a Front-End Developer, and specifically as a Full Stack Web Developer intern on an Online Software Training Provider Institute Website at Codeango Private Limited.

I thrive in problem-solving, teamwork, and adaptability. Outside of work, I enjoy coding, football, movies, music, and traveling. I'm eager to contribute to innovative projects and collaborate on something extraordinary.
